procTypeD.description: The processing type at the destination shard. It can be `Normal` or `Scheduled`.

procTypeS.description: The processing type at the source shard. It can be `Normal` or `Scheduled`.

receiverBlockHash.description: The hash (hex encoded) of the destination block in which the miniblock was included.

receiverShard.description: The shard ID of the destination block.

senderBlockHash.description: The hash (hex encoded) of the source block in which the miniblock was included.

senderShard.description: The shard ID of the source block.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the block in which the miniblock was executed.

type.description: The type of the miniblock. It can be `TxBlock` (if it contains transactions) or `SmartContractResultBlock` (if it contains smart contracts results).
